Name: Socrates
Soz: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.

Name: Unknown
Soz: The biggest room in the world is the room for improvement.

Name: Socrates
Soz: Falling down is not failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.

Name: Wayne Dyer
Soz: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.

Name: Earl Nightingale
Soz: Successful people are not without problems. They're simply people who've learned to solve their problems.

Name: Demosthenes
Soz: A man is his own easiest dupe, for what he wishes to be true he generally believes to be true

Name: Mark Twain
Soz: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes

Name: Eleanor Roosevelt
Soz: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people

Name: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Soz: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need

Name: Rumi
Soz: Everything in the universe is within you. Ask all from yourself

Name: Desiderius Erasmus
Soz: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes
